page.title: 03LOWER JUNIORS BUGTHORPE SCH.
page.content: On a normal school day in the middle class first we do the register then we read. At 9.30 we do English we do information cards. Information cards are pices of card with questions on about things like deserts. You look in a book about the questions you are answering. There are about 9 or 10 questions. Another thing we do is diary. We do diary once a week. We write about what we did in the weekend. Sometimes we write poems and stories for English. The bell rings at 10.30 for playtime. Playtime finishes at 10.45. At 11.00 we do S.M.P. S.M.P is maths that you do from cards. We have dinner at 12.00 then we have playtime till 1.00. In the afternoon we sometimes make things. At 3.30 we go home.
